name: Les Champotes
description:
Protect your base from the evil shrooms !! Throw your spore all over the forest and combine them with your friends' one to get rid of your opponents

Shroom sprites by Caz Creates Games, check his awesome repo here !

Possible Updates:

  • 4 players
  • Sound
  • Boss battle
  • Waves of enemies
  • Android LAN Release
  • Multiple Map
  • Player class with different powers

Let me know if you want more !
